PLAYER HEIGHT WEIGHT DOB PLACE OF BIRTH 40 Patrick Lalime 6' 3" 189 Jul 7, 1974 St. Bonaventur, QC, CAN 30 Ryan Miller 6' 2" 175 Jul 17, 1980 East Lansing, MI, USA SABRES' STATS: Quote: http://sabres.nhl.com/club/stats.htm FLYERS-SABRES' SERIES HISTORY: Current and Miscellaneous: The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season record is 73-55-20-4 including 7-2-1 in the last ten. The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season home record is 44-19-12-3. The Flyers' W-L-T-OTL regular season road record is 29-36-8-1 including 5-0-1 in the last six. The Flyers are 25-18 (17-6 at home, 8-12 away) in 43 PO games. The Flyers are 5-3 in eight PO series, winning in 1975 (4-2), 1978 (4-1), 1995 (4-1), 1997 (4-1) and 2000 (4-1) and losing in 1998 (4-1), 2001 (4-2) and 2006 (4-2)
